title: Real-World Data Pattern MicroSim
description: An interactive climate modeling MicroSim that compares simulation-generated data with real-world observations, teaching students to evaluate model accuracy and interpret authentic data patterns.
subject: Mathematics
author: Dan McCreary
learningObjectives: Understand the mathematical concept of real-world data pattern
Apply real-world data pattern to solve problems
Visualize and interpret real-world data pattern relationships
Experiment with parameters to observe their effects on real-world data pattern
